speaker: agent
text: If you are calling From [LOCATION], press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: Otherwise, thank you for calling [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION].

speaker: agent
text: Your call may be monitored and recorded.

speaker: customer
text: We may collect financial, historical, internal, external, social and tracking information about you in order to provide service and for other purposes as explained on our website.

speaker: agent
text: By continuing you consent to this later delivery of our privacy policy.

speaker: agent
text: Please hold while I transfer your call.

speaker: customer
text: Thanks for calling.

speaker: agent
text: This is [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: How can I help you?

speaker: customer
text: Yes, hello.

speaker: agent
text: Yeah, hey, [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: customer
text: [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION].

speaker: agent
text: What can I do for you?

speaker: customer
text: You can't do nothing for me.

speaker: agent
text: I thought you were going to sell me insurance.

speaker: customer
text: What the hell are you on the phone for?

speaker: agent
text: I thought you knew what you were doing.

speaker: customer
text: Huh?

speaker: agent
text: Goodbye.

speaker: customer
text: You have been kicked from this conference.
